title: janmamenduku
sahitya:
janmamenduku bhaktilEni nara janmamella bhAramE manasA


anupallavi

  manmatAntakAra magucIkatilO mari mari dUri mahilOnu puTTE


caraNam 1    tana deivamani anya deivamani tanalOnE tAnE tArtamyamenci 
penu vAta tarkamulu cEsi cEsi ghanamaina pApamulu salpucuNTE
(or) penu vAta tarkamulu cEsi cEsi ghanamaina pApamunu pencuNTE
    caraNam 2    tana pAshamuna tagili cintalEka dhana dhAnyamulE deivamaniyenci 
tanavaNTi mAnavunu sannutinci tanaprAyamella tArumAru cEsE 
    caraNam 3    hari brahma rudrAdulu nErccina vara gIta tatvArttamulu cadivi
(or) hari brahma rudrAdulanella mAni hari gIta tatvArttamulu cadivi
varada venkaTEshvaruni bhajiyincE vara bhaktulatO vAtADucuNTE
